channel.title: ~~~Project RuneParty Dev Team~~~ Recruiting now!~~~~
channel.description:
~~~Project RuneParty Dev Team~~~
This is a server that is wanting to get on the net very fast! Right now we are recruiting many things, server mods, forum admins/mods, coders, testers and many other things. If you would like to join, please copy and paste this code in your post and fill it out. I ALSO NEED A PERSON TO CREATE THE SERVER. MY NETWORK DOES NOT ALLOW ME TO SO IF YOU CAN CREATE THE SERVER FOR RUNEPARTY, TYPE SERVER CREATOR IN JOB WANTED IN THE APPLICATION.
[code]Username: Job wanted: experiance in job: why you want to join: what will you do: other info:[/code]
Jobs: (- = spot open)
Server Admins: Dki Demon I Spec U I
Mods: - - -
Coders: Kyledibiase - -
Testers: - - -
Forum admins: Dki Demon doggyfan24tj
Forum mods: Ricky James - -
IF I ACCEPT U, U MUST COME BACK AND POST WITHIN 48 HOURS OR YOU WILL BE DELETED FROM STAFF.
Go ahead and join! :)
Forums:http://runeparty.smfforfree4.com/index.php
P.S, still need help with forums!
